**About Petris Consulting LLC**

Petris Consulting LLC is a registered company in the state of Georgia in the United States, incorporated in March 2014 and operated by myself. I am a software engineer based in Atlanta with experience in many languages and other technical subjects such as server administration.

My goal is to provide DDoS-protected virtual servers at an affordable price on nodes that are properly maintained and looked after. Various monitoring software is used to ensure servers are operating optimally, many of which are publicly available (see [Observium](https://status.petris.net/) and [uptime reports](https://wiki.petris.net/display/INFO/Uptime+Reports)).

**Offer**

* 1GB RAM
* 25GB Storage
* 1 Virtual CPU
* 2TB Data Transfer
* 1 IPv4 Address
* 5 IPv6 Addresses
* **KVM** Virtualization
* SolusVM Control Panel
* $7/month

[Order Now](https://client.petris.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=17)

**Node Specifications**

* Intel Xeon E5-1620v2 (3.7 GHz)
* 64GB DDR3 RAM (1600MHz)
* 2 x 2TB HDD (Software RAID 1)
* 1Gbps port, 500Mbps transfer speed

**Support Policy**

To keep prices low, all services are strictly unmanaged.

**Refund Policy**

You may request a full refund for your first service within the first 72 hours of your initial order being approved. Refund requests must be made via a ticket.

**Other Information**

* Initial orders are manually reviewed; after your initial order, services are instantly provisioned after payment.
    * New orders are screened using MaxMind and FraudRecord.
    * **If your order is automatically flagged as fraudulent, please submit a ticket for your order to be reviewed.**
* Servers are located at OVH's datacenter in Beauharnois, Canada.
* Permanent DDoS mitigation can be enabled for your IPv4 address upon request.
* Payments can be made via PayPal or Stripe. No card information is stored or transmitted through our servers.
* [Beauharnois Looking Glass](http://lg-bhs.petris.net/)
* [List of KVM Templates/ISOs Available](https://wiki.petris.net/display/INFO/Server+Templates)
* [ServerBear Benchmark](http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2014/07/20/jxr6k40jAGLqqa4k)

Please feel free to [open a sales ticket](https://client.petris.net/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3) should you have any questions or concerns prior to purchasing.
